Slow or no Internet Connection"\n"Please check your internet setting
Enter the amount on the invoice
Take a picture of the invoice
Write a message to your potential lender
Type a message to your lender & explain why you want this invoice paid for you now....
This agreement is between you and the borrower, you must press the Agreement paid in full icon when you receive all payments. You can forgive any agreement at any time.
Please indicate what % of the invoice amount you would like to offer your lender for paying your invoice for you :
To make an agreement with your friend M8\'s R8\'s has an agreement creation fee of CHF5.00 would you like to pay that now or add it to the invoice amount you wish to be paid.
Please sign your offer and M8\'s R8\'s will send it to your potential lender to approve, refuse or adjust it.
This agreement is between you and one of your friends Please find the friend you would like to lend and reward for paying this invoice on a social network or an instant messenger service
Your offer has been sent to your M8. They can accept, adjust or reject it, please be patient and await their reply, you will receive a notification as soon as they answer it. Good luck!
